siyalu wame paksha, sanwidhana, adhyayana kawa ha sanskruthika ekathun athara pulul sahayogithawak goda naga ganimath, anugrahaka deshapalana bami binda helime upaya margayak soya ganimath, adhyapanaya, saukhya sewaya, podu prawahanaya saha sanskruthika kshethraya thula pulul prathisanskarana wada piliwelak idiripath kirimath, eya aarthika prathisanskarana wada piliwelak samaga sambandha kirimath (nidasunak lesa kshudra naya prashnayata prayogika wikalpayak gramiya padanamen idiripath kirima) saha deshapalakayanta erehiwa athi podu wirodhaya sanwidhanaya karana janathawadi wyaparayak goda nagimath idiri yugaye jayagrahi wame deshapalanayak sandaha danata yojana kala haki upayan kihipayaki.

maranaya enathek wasi athi asipiya pawa sundarathwayen themalimata adhyakshawarayata awashyawa thibune dayi ee dutu mata sithini.kusa paba sinama pataya rupa ramuwen ramuwata apata samipa karawanne boho kalakin apata athwindinnata nolabunu andame siyum sundarathwayak bawa da, eya kisima thanakadi paludu nokara nirmanaya nima kirimata mahacharya sunilun uparima uthsahayak dara athi bawada ema karyayata an samage dayakathwaya manawin labi athi bawa mehi satahan nokarama no hakiya.ese wuwada puja ge sukumara rupashriya thulin paba ge sundarathwaya ismathu kirime wyayamayata mahacharya sunilun oonawatath wada awadhanayak yomu kele dayi athamwita sithe.
eeth anthima prashneta uththare nam godak waidya shishyayoth danne na.

pramanaya,wyuhaya,awakashaya saha wiparinamaya yanadi da adhyayanaya kirima sandaha ganithaya upakari we.anek athata ,prathyaksha saha arthadakwimwalin arambai nigami tharkanaya mangin sanatha kala danum sambharaya wanahi ganithayayi.wada saralawa kiyathothginum thabima, bimmanuma saha tharaka shasthra aadi prayogika karyan sandaha ganithaya yoda ganima thulin danuma goda naga ganimata ganithaya wadagath we.
ewita, ee jalaya, anagathaye di nasa aayathanaya ha wenath aayathanawala abhyawakasha wada satahan yatathe uduguwanata yana ayage pa්rayojanayata gatha haki wewi.
